title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 242.8 - Denial of request for record or amendment or correction of record or personal information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 242.8 - Denial of request for record or amendment or correction of record or personal information

State Regulations
(a) Denial of a request for records or amendment or correction of a record or personal information: (1)
shall be in writing, explaining the reasons therefor; and
(2)
shall identify the person to whom an appeal may be directed. (b) A failure to grant or deny access to records within five business days of the receipt of a request, or within 30 days of an acknowledgment of the receipt of a request, or a failure to respond to a request for amendment or correction of a record within 30 business days of receipt of such a request, shall be construed as a denial that may be appealed. (c) Any such denial may be appealed to: Deputy Superintendent and General Counsel

New York State Insurance Department
25 Beaver Street

New York, NY 10004
